content:
OK, i'm thinking I'll go with something very simple for now:

AsyncAwait-Blocking
AsyncAwait-Deferred

and maybe a third tag for things where we are "unsure"?
I'm doing some triage now. I'm also tagging some things with E-NeedsMentor

@Taylor Cramer I marked https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/52924 as AsyncAwait-Unclear -- this is the storage-dead / storage-live stuff -- I forget if it's the main issue. I sort of semi-consider that a blocker, I have to say, at least for the "encourage widespread use" consideration.
